mapper.select:
/* 키워드 검색 2023.09.15 SQL ID : CoTechDemandSQL.doAutoSearchKeyword */
select tc.code_name from tbtech_code tc where tc.code_name like '%${code_name}%' group by tc.code_key;
mapper.insert:
/* 2023.09.15 SQL ID : CoTechDemandSQL.registTechDemandCo 기술수요 등록 */
INSERT INTO techdemand_corporate( mid_category, small_category, keyword, coporate_problem, hold_rnd_infra, willingness_to_invest, compa_name, dept, manager_position, manager_name, mobilephone_num, biz_email ) VALUES( #{medi_category}, #{small_category}, #{keyword}, #{erro}, #{rndInfra}, #{investWilling}, #{bizName}, #{dept}, #{managerPosition}, #{managerName}, #{userMobileNo}, #{biz_email} )
